EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Back to MBO! (1380743424.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome Back to MBO! (1380743424.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Curtis, It was so nice speaking with you today, welcome back to MBO! Please consider me your point of contact and follow the steps below to complete your re-enrollment. - Since you just re-enrolled in April please log in and click on “enrollment documents” and print out I-9 at the end of the enrollment - You will sign/date section 1 and local notary will sign/date section 2 (most people visit their local bank.) Please email or fax back to MBO (we do not need an original copy.) If you use a US passport as supporting documentation I will need an image of it to comply with E-Verify (most people just take a picture with their phone and then email it to me.) You can find a list of approved notary’s here <http://www.mbopartners.com/notaries>. - I will send you a separate email to send to your new client that will introduce them to MBO. - The link to my private page can be found here <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> there are lots of great resources on this page and I encourage you to bookmark it. Please contact me with any questions. Take care!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
